inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: TTE revealed severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function.

inclusion.criterion: Mean transaortic gradient ≥ 40 mmHg(at rest or stress)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Arotic valve area <0.8 cm2 and/or aortic valve area index< 0.5cm2/m2
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: TTE revealed severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function.

inclusion.criterion: Symptoms of dyspnea and fatigue when at rest or after slight exertion (New York Heart Association ≥ Ⅲ -Ⅳ)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He was sent home from cardiology clinic with Lasix and BB (which he did not tolerate), continued to have worsening SOB and LE edema

inclusion.criterion: Intermittant fluid retention and/or symptoms induced by low cardiac output at rest, but lack of hemodynamic instability
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He was sent home from cardiology clinic with Lasix and BB (which he did not tolerate), continued to have worsening SOB and LE edema

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated acute cardiac failure due to hemodynamic instability
